name: budget_id
description: Unique identifier for the budget (UUID)

name: org_slug
description: Organization slug - ensures multi-tenancy isolation

name: hierarchy_entity_id
description: Hierarchy entity ID (e.g., DEPT-ENG, PROJ-CORE, TEAM-BACKEND)

name: hierarchy_entity_name
description: Human-readable hierarchy entity name

name: hierarchy_path
description: Materialized path for hierarchy (e.g., /Acme/Engineering/Backend)

name: hierarchy_level_code
description: Hierarchy level code: department, project, team

name: category
description: Cost category: cloud, genai, subscription, total

name: budget_type
description: Budget type: monetary, token, seat

name: budget_amount
description: Budget amount (in currency units, tokens, or seats)

name: currency
description: Currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) - only for monetary budgets

name: period_type
description: Budget period: monthly, quarterly, yearly, custom

name: period_start
description: Budget period start date

name: period_end
description: Budget period end date

name: provider
description: Optional provider filter (e.g., gcp, aws, openai)

name: notes
description: Optional notes or description for the budget

name: is_active
description: Whether the budget is active (soft delete = false)

name: created_by
description: User who created the budget

name: updated_by
description: User who last updated the budget

name: created_at
description: Creation timestamp

name: updated_at
description: Last update timestamp
